name: RiskAdjustmenthierarchicalStatusCodeSystem
title: Risk Adjustment Hierarchical Status Code System
description: This is a code system for Risk Adjustment Hierarchical Status to indicate whether hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category, and if applied, whether the Condition Category is superseded.

concept.display: Hierarchies applied and Condition Category is superseded
concept.definition: Hierarchies were applied to a Condition Catetory and the Condition Category is superseded.

concept.display: Hierarchies applied and Condition Category is not superseded
concept.definition: Hierarchies were applied to a Condition Catetory and the Condition Category is not superseded.
Hierarchies were not applied to a Condition Catetory.
Applying hierarchies to a Condition Category is not applicable.
